headline: Bitcoin ETF Inflows Resume Sparking “Digital Gold” Narrative, Ether ETFs Bleed
summary: Amid the broader crypto market correction, Bitcoin BTC $111 215 24h volatility: 1.9% Market cap: $2.21 T Vol. 24h: $44.24 B is once again emerging as a safe haven asset, regaining the “digital gold” narrative amid the global macro uncertainty. Inflows into spot Bitcoin ETFs surged on September 2, recording ...

headline: Invesco Ltd. to Participate in the Barclays Global Financial Services Conference
summary: Invesco Ltd. (NYSE: IVZ) today announced that Andrew Schlossberg, President and Chief Executive Officer, and Allison Dukes, Chief Financial Officer, will participate in a fireside chat at the Barclays Global Financial Services Conference on September 9, 2025, at 7:30 a.m. ET.
